titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide capital gain treatment under section 631(b) of such Code for outright sales of timber by landowners.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide capital gain treatment under section 631(b) of such Code for outright sales of timber by landowners.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide capital gain treatment for outright timber sales by landowners.
